title: IPH 42 - Fill your hearts with joy and gladness

lines: Fill your hearts with joy and
sing and praise your God and
Great the Lord in love and
He who framed the starry heavens
knows and names them as they
Praise the Lord, His people, praise Him!
those who fear Him find His mercies,
peace for pain and joy for woe;
human pride and power laid low.
Praise the Lord for times and
spring to melt the snows of
Fill your hearts with joy and
walk in all His words and ways;
He and Lord and we His
praise the Lord, all people, praise!

CCLI: Timothy Dudley-Smith, b. 1926 From Psalm 147 CCLI 128675
